external_games.name: Ikasuze! Koi no Doki-doki Penguin Land MD
Ikazuse! Koi no Doki Doki Penguin Land MD

name: Ikasuze! Koi no Doki-doki Penguin Land MD
summary: Ikazuse! Koi no Doki-doki Penguin Land MD — called just Doki-doki Penguin Land on Sega's archive — is a Sega Mega Drive game released only in Japan as part of the Sega Game Toshokan service. It is an update to the previous games in the series, Doki Doki Penguin Land and Penguin Land, and features the same basic gameplay of having to guide an egg to the bottom of the screen.
